parameter-group.name: authentication
parameter-group.label: Authentication
parameter-group.description: Authentication for connecting to OpenAI API.

parameter.name: model
parameter.label: Model
parameter.description: ID of the model to use.

parameter.name: voice
parameter.label: Voice
parameter.description: The voice to use when generating the audio. Previews of the voices are available in the text to speech guide. https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/text-to-speech/voice-options

parameter.description: The speed of the generated audio. Select a value from 0.25 to 4.0.
